title: Codeword: Amotik, Nørbak, Kameliia, Cukier
description: With an unwavering vision for hypnotic, atmospheric, and driving techno—and fresh off the launch of its label arm with CW001—Codeword takes over the Main Room at FOLD with a heavyweight lineup.

title: The Flaming Lips
description: American psychedelic rock band The Flaming Lips continue their celebrations of the 20th anniversary of their classic album Yoshimi Battles the Pink Robots, a sci-fi-themed quasi-concept record that cast The Flaming Lips’ most playful and profound songs to date; in a wondrous swirl of ambient electronics, digital beats, and psychedelic splendor.

title: Gigi Perez
description: Having clocked up more than 200 million streams with her breakthrough track ‘Sometimes (Backwood)’, New Jersey singer-songwriter Gigi Perez surpassed her own record with last year’s massive ‘Sailor Song’, reaching the top of the UK Singles Chart. Having supported Coldplay and Noah Cyrus among other musical juggernauts, catch the viral singer-songwriter as she readies her next soon-to-be-huge project: she won’t be playing rooms of this size for much longer.

title: KAYTRANADA
description: Hailing from Montreal and of Haitian descent, Louis Kevin Celestin (aka KAYTRANADA) is a globally renowned DJ and one of the world’s most innovative electronic music producers. Bursting onto the scene with his viral unofficial remix of Janet Jackson’s If, he quickly cemented his status with his groundbreaking debut album 99.9%. The critically acclaimed record earned him prestigious accolades, including the Polaris Music Prize and a Juno Award. His GRAMMY-winning follow-up, BUBBA, propelled him even further with chart-topping hits and collaborations with artists like Kali Uchis, GoldLink, and Masego.

title: Chase & Status
description: As one of the most successful British bands of the last decade Chase & Status have achieved widespread notoriety and universal respect for their achievements. Consummate professionals at every level, Will Kennard and Saul Milton, are contemporary vanguards of UK electronic music.
